## Summary
Provide a short summary of the changes in this PR.

## Changelog entry (required)
Add a single-line changelog entry suitable for `roles/defos/CHANGELOG.md` under the `Unreleased` section.
Format: `- [Added|Changed|Fixed] Short description. (PR #123 / JIRA-123)`

Example:
- Added: Add `tls_cert_path` variable to allow custom certificate locations. (JIRA-123, PR #42)

## Related issues / PRs
- Link to issue(s) or PR(s) this change addresses.

## Testing
- Describe how this change was tested (example: `molecule test`, `vagrant`, applied to staging host, etc.)

### Reviewer checklist
